sentences.en: a highly sophisticated weapons system
sentences.cn: 非常精密的武器系统

sentences.en: a sophisticated, witty American
sentences.cn: 一个见多识广、机智风趣的美国人

sentences.en: British TV commercials are glossy and sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 英国的电视广告光艳浮华，矫揉造作。

sentences.en: British voters have become much more sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 英国的选民已经变得成熟多了。

sentences.en: Clarissa’s hair was swept up into a sophisticated style.
sentences.cn: 克拉丽莎的头发向后梳成一个很老成的式样。

sentences.en: Claude was a charming, sophisticated companion.
sentences.cn: 克劳德是个有魅力、见多识广的伙伴。

sentences.en: Cocktails at the Plaza was a nightly ritual of their sophisticated world.
sentences.cn: 到广场饭店喝鸡尾酒是他们这个高雅时髦的圈子中的人每晚必做的事情。

sentences.en: Downshifters are being tempted to leave the sophisticated city and go simple.
sentences.cn: 追求放慢生活节奏的人群渴望告别喧嚣的城市，过简单的生活。

sentences.en: He comes across as an intelligent, sophisticated, charmer.
sentences.cn: 他给人的印象是有头脑、老练，很会讨人喜欢。

sentences.en: He had not expected such crudity from so sophisticated a minister.
sentences.cn: 他真没想到如此见多识广的部长竟会这么幼稚。

sentences.en: He was worldly and sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 他阅历丰富，老于世故。

sentences.en: Honeybees use one of the most sophisticated communication systems of any insect.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂之间所用的交流方式是昆虫中最为复杂的方式之一。

sentences.en: It will only register on sophisticated X-ray equipment.
sentences.cn: 只有精密的X射线仪器才能显示出来。

sentences.en: Mark is a smart and sophisticated young man.
sentences.cn: 马克是一个聪明老成的年轻人。

sentences.en: Mr. Smith is a sophisticated world traveler.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生是一位老练的环球旅行家.

sentences.en: Recently her tastes have become more sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 最近她的品位越发优雅时髦起来。

sentences.en: She has become very sophisticated since she went to live in London.
sentences.cn: 移居伦敦后她变得世故多了.

sentences.en: Some sign languages are very sophisticated means of communication.
sentences.cn: 有些手语可以表达非常复杂的内容。

sentences.en: sophisticated software
sentences.cn: 很先进的软件

sentences.en: The family are rich, and extremely sophisticated and cosmopolitan.
sentences.cn: 这家人很富有，老于世故，而且见多识广。

sentences.en: the sophisticated pleasures of city life
sentences.cn: 城市生活中五花八门的享乐

sentences.en: These people are very sophisticated observers of the foreign policy scene.
sentences.cn: 这些人是观察外交政策领域动向的行家里手。

sentences.en: Yul listened to their sophisticated, rapid-fire conversation.
sentences.cn: 尤尔听了他们老练的、连珠炮似的一番谈话。

words.tran_cn: 二年级的；二年级学生的
复杂；诡辩；老于世故；有教养
大学二年级生；（美）有二年经验的人
弄复杂；使变得世故；曲解
复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的
使变得世故；使迷惑；篡改（sophisticate的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 复杂的，精致的，富有经验的，深奥微妙的
trans.tran_en: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

trans.tran_cn: 使变得世故，使迷惑，篡改(sophisticate的过去分词形式)
